extensionDescription.message: Supports platforms such as GitHub, GitLab, Bitbucket, npm, Docker, etc. Quick navigation by typing in the address bar.

options_subtitle.message: A minimalist and efficient code repository navigation tool

default_platform_info.message: When input does not contain a platform keyword, this platform will be used by default for search or jump.

enable_search_redirect.message: Enable automatic redirects from search engines

advanced_info.message: The following domains or keywords will not trigger automatic jumps.

enter_pattern_error.message: Please enter the address pattern to exclude

omnibox_default_suggestion.message: Enter repository name or package name
